name: Minskies
description: Minskies Furballs is not a port, but a spiritual clone of Puyo Puyo. In a tournament against a cast of crazy characters, you must guide and rotating falling pairs of cats of different colours to make up colour combinations.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: Pentium 4, Athlon 64 or later Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Athlon 64 or later Storage: 256 MB available space
